title: Dombivali Fast
summary: Bank clerk turns vigilante in a corrupt world

title: Ek Hota Vidhushak
cast: Laxmikant Berde, Varsha Usgaonkar, Nilu Phule, Mohan Agashe
summary: Life of a Tamasha folk theatre clown whose rise to fame tests his values.

title: A Breath
cast: Arun Nalawade, Ashwin Chitale, Sandeep Kulkarni, Amruta Subhash
summary: A grandfather tries to show his young grandson the beauty and preciousness of life while confronting a terminal illness.

title: Vaastupurush
cast: Uttara Baokar, Sadashiv Amrapurkar, Atul Kulkarni, Siddharth Daftardar
summary: A doctor returns to his ancestral village and recalls his past life and family history influenced by tradition.

title: Deool
cast: Girish Kulkarni, Nana Patekar, Dilip Prabhavalkar, Sonali Kulkarni, Hrishikesh Joshi
summary: A villagerâ€™s vision of God sparks unexpected social and political turmoil in his village as religious belief gets commercialized and exploited.

title: Shwaas
summary: A grandfather tries to show his grandson the beauty of the world before the boy undergoes an operation that will leave him blind.

title: Court
summary: A social activist is accused of inciting a sewage worker's suicide by one of his folk songs, leading to a trial in a lower court.

title: Sairat
summary: Two college students from different castes fall in love, sparking conflict between their families and society.

title: Natsamrat
summary: After retiring from the stage, a veteran Shakespearean actor and his wife face the harsh realities of old age and ungrateful children.

title: Killa
summary: An 11-year-old boy struggles to cope with the death of his father and his mother's frequent job transfers in a new coastal town.

title: Harishchandrachi Factory
summary: The story of Dadasaheb Phalke, who struggled to make India's first feature film, Raja Harishchandra, in 1913.

title: Fandry
summary: A young boy from a lower caste falls in love with a girl from an upper caste, highlighting the deep-rooted prejudice in rural India.

title: Elizabeth Ekadashi
summary: Two siblings in Pandharpur try to save their beloved bicycle, named 'Elizabeth,' from being sold by their mother to pay off debts.

title: Katyar Kaljat Ghusali
summary: Based on a play, it depicts the intense rivalry between two classical singers over the position of the royal singer in a princely state.

title: Paani
cast: Adinath Kothare, Rucha Vaidya, Subodh Bhave
summary: Based on a true story, a man from a drought-prone village in Nanded leads a movement to make his village water-independent to win back his love.

title: Mee Vasantrao
summary: A biographical film based on the life of the legendary classical singer Vasantrao Deshpande and his journey in music.

title: Gharat Ganpati
director: Navjyot BandiwadekarBhushan Pradhan, Nikita Dutta, Ajinkya Deo
summary: Three generations of the Gharat family gather at their ancestral Konkan home for the Ganeshotsav festival, leading to the resolution of old conflicts.

title: Naal
summary: A young boy living in a remote village begins to question his identity and the nature of his relationship with his mother.

title: Kaksparsha
summary: Set in pre-independence India, the story follows a man who protects his widowed sister-in-law while strictly adhering to family traditions.

title: Pinjara
summary: A highly respected moralistic schoolteacher falls for a dancer, leading to his social and personal downfall.

title: Shaala
summary: Set in the 1970s, four school friends navigate the complexities of growing up, politics, and first love in rural Maharashtra.

title: Ashi Hi Banwa Banwi
summary: To find a place to stay, two brothers and their friends are forced to dress as women and pretend to be the wives of the others.

title: Jogwa
summary: A hard-hitting story about the "Jogtin" tradition where individuals are forced into a life of servitude to a goddess.

title: Balak Palak
summary: A group of teenagers embark on a journey of curiosity to understand the "birds and the bees" in a society where sex is taboo.

title: Dashavatar
summary: A veteran folk performer's final play turns into a cultural battle to protect local heritage and environment in the Konkan region.
